Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Math/round
Synopsis Round a number to the nearest multiple of a given number (default 1).
Function
  1. int round(num d)
  2. (&T <: num) round(&T <: num r, &T <: num nearest)
Usage import util::Math;
Examples 
rascal>import util::Math;
ok
rascal>round(3.4);
int: 3
rascal>round(3.5);
int: 4
rascal>round(3.6);
int: 4
rascal>round(-3.4);
int: -3
rascal>round(-3.5);
int: -4
rascal>round(-3.6);
int: -4
rascal>round(13, 5);
int: 15
rascal>round(1.5,0.2);
real: 1.60
rascal>round(3r2,1r4);
rat: 3r2
